message.value: @concat(pipeline().Pipeline,' pipeline is executing for use case ', string(pipeline().parameters.category))

query.value:
Select 
"'tableName'" AS tableName,
"'schemaName'" AS schemaName,
"'excludedColumns'" AS excludedColumns,
"'target_folder_path'" AS target_folder_path,
"'sftp_folder_path'" AS sftp_folder_path,
"'fileExtn'" AS fileExtn,
"'container'" AS container,
"'zip_archive_path'" AS zip_archive_path
from (SELECT PARAMETERS.PARAMETER_NAME,PARAMETER_VALUE,PARAMETER_GROUP_NAME,IS_SENSITIVE
FROM META_RAW.PARAMETERS 
JOIN META_RAW.PROCESS USING (PARAMETER_GROUP_ID)
WHERE PROCESS_ID = @{pipeline().parameters.process_id}
AND IS_ACTIVE = TRUE)
as A pivot ( MAX (PARAMETER_VALUE) for PARAMETER_NAME in (
'tableName',
'schemaName',
'excludedColumns',
'target_folder_path',
'sftp_folder_path',
'fileExtn',
'container',
'zip_archive_path'
));

text.value:
select
	case
		when lower(column_name) = '顧客id' then 'JPDCLEDW_INTEGRATION.encryption(顧客ID)  as 顧客ID '
		else column_name 
	end as column_name
from
	(select	column_name, ordinal_position	from  INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE table_name = '@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].tableName}' and lower(column_name) not in (@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].excludedColumns}) order by	ordinal_position asc )
SELECT distinct "コンタクト履歴番号" from @{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].schemaName}.@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].tableName}

select @{replace(variables('appendedList'),',,','')} from @{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].schemaName}.@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].tableName} where "コンタクト履歴番号" ='@{variables('chno')}'

query.value: select @{replace(variables('appendedList'),',,','')} from @{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].schemaName}.@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].tableName} where "コンタクト履歴番号" ='@{variables('chno')}'

supportMessage.value:
There is some issue while writing csv file into ADLS : \n
**PROCESS_ID**:  @{pipeline().parameters.process_id}  \n
**CATEGORY**: @{pipeline().parameters.category} \n
**PHASE_ID**:   @{pipeline().parameters.phase_id}   \n
**USECASE_ID**: @{pipeline().parameters.usecase_id} \n
**SEQUENCE_ID**: @{pipeline().parameters.sequence_id} \n
**CONTAINER**: @{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].container} \n
**TARGET_FILE_PATH**: @{variables('parentFolder')}/@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].target_folder_path} \n
**TARGET_FILE_NAME**: @{variables('date_yyyyMMddHHmmss')}.@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].fileExtn} \n
**SOURCE_QUERY**: select "コンタクト履歴番号" as chno @{variables('appendedList')} from @{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].schemaName}.@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].tableName} where chno='@{variables('chno')}' \n
**ERROR**: _@{activity('create csv').error?.message}_

message.value: Error While writing csv into ADLS: @{activity('create csv').error?.errorCode} @{activity('create csv').error?.message}

value.value: @if(contains(item().COLUMN_NAME,'JPDCLEDW_INTEGRATION.encryption(顧客ID)  as 顧客ID'),concat(variables('temp'),', JPDCLEDW_INTEGRATION.encryption("顧客id")  as "顧客id"'),concat(variables('temp'),', ' ,'"',item().COLUMN_NAME,'"'))

**PHASE_ID**:   @{pipeline().parameters.phase_id}   \n

**SOURCE_FILE_PATH**: @{variables('parentFolder')}/@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].target_folder_path} \n
